Question: The era saw the arrival of novelties like dolls modeled after this person, which appeared in stores in May 1984 at a price of $12.
Hints: In what would have been this person's 52nd birthday on August 29, 2010, he became the most downloaded artist of all time.
It is estimated that this person earned about $750 million in his lifetime.
This person had expected the licenses to the masters of his albums to revert to him sometime in the early 2000s.
